# lbmap/CMakeLists.txt
# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE

# Set the project name and C++ standard
project(lbmap)

# Specify directories
set(SOURCE_DIR "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/lbmap/src")

# Include directories
include_directories(
    /opt/local/include
    ${HDF5_DIR}/include
)

# Link directories
link_directories(
    /opt/local/lib/gcc9
    ${HDF5_DIR}/lib
)

# Libraries to link against
set(LIBS
    -lgfortran
    -lstdc++
    -lhdf5
    -lnetcdf
    -llapack
)

# Source files
set(SRCS
    ${SOURCE_DIR}/run.cpp
    ${SOURCE_DIR}/intersections.cpp
    ${SOURCE_DIR}/lobe.cpp
)

# Add the executable
add_executable(lbmap ${SRCS})

# Include fusion_io headers
target_include_directories(lbmap PUBLIC ${HDF5_DIR}/include)

# Link to libraries
target_link_libraries(lbmap PRIVATE ${LIBS})
